participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and motivated, Emily is someone who thrives on challenges and enjoys helping others achieve their goals.
participant_1.background: i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. my parents were both very athletic.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and easy-going, Jake enjoys spending time with his friends and embraces a carefree lifestyle.
participant_2.background: i just want to have fun with my friends. i'm 19 and i cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work too; i have a part-time job at burger king.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
